00021 #ifndef BOOST_INCLUDED_XINT_DATA_T_H
00022 #define BOOST_INCLUDED_XINT_DATA_T_H
00023 
00024 #if !defined(XINT_SECURE)
00025     #include <vector>
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 namespace xint {
00029 namespace detail {
00030 
00036 struct data_t {
00044     struct QuickDigits {
00045         static const size_t intbits=std::numeric_limits<unsigned int>::digits;
00046         static const size_t suggested=(2*intbits/bits_per_digit); 
00047         static const size_t minimum=3; 
00048         static const size_t count=(suggested < minimum ? minimum : suggested);
00049     };
00050 
00051     size_t mLength, mAllocated;
00052     digit_t *digits; 
00053     digit_t mQuickDigits[QuickDigits::count];
00054 
00055     #if !defined(XINT_SECURE)
00056         std::vector<digit_t> mStorage;
00057     #endif
00058 
00059     int mCopies;
00060     bool mIsNegative;
00061 
00062     public:
00063     data_t(digit_t initial1=0, digit_t initial2=0, digit_t initial3=0);
00064     data_t(data_t *c);
00065 
00066     #if defined(XINT_SECURE)
00067         ~data_t();
00068     #endif
00069 
00070     void attach() { ++mCopies; }
00071     bool detach() { return (--mCopies==0); }
00072     void alloc(size_t digits, bool copydigits=false);
00073     void realloc(size_t newdigits) { alloc(newdigits, true); }
00074     void skipLeadingZeros();
00075     void copy(const data_t *c, size_t extraDigits=0);
00076     void zero(digit_t *p, size_t count);
00077 
00078     void quickset(digit_t d1, digit_t d2=0, digit_t d3=0);
00079 
00080     void invert();
00081     void negate();
00082 
00083     // These primitives ignore the signs of the parameters, and their results
00084     // are calculated in place.
00085     void add(const data_t& addend);
00086     void subtract(const data_t& subtrahend);
00087 
00088     // These are also calculated in place, for maximum speed.
00089     void shift_left(size_t byBits);
00090     void shift_right(size_t byBits);
00091 };
00092 
00093 } // namespace detail
00094 } // namespace xint

00096 #endif // BOOST_INCLUDED_XINT_DATA_T_H
